sections.description: Integration between Paid Memberships Pro and the TextIt service. Allows register/cancel operations plus pause/resume of TextIt services based on membership events or member action.
sections.changelog:
2.1.3

  1. BUG FIX: Didn't send correct fields for the Emergency Contact info to TextIt service
  2. BUG FIX: Add config support for emergency contact activation for TextIt
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Triggering Emergency Contact welcome flows on registration

2.1.2

  1. BUG FIX: Didn't send correct fields for the Emergency Contact info to TextIt service
  2. BUG FIX: Add config support for emergency contact activation for TextIt
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Triggering Emergency Contact welcome flows on registration

2.1

  1. BUG FIX/ENHANCEMENT: Any existing Contact record on TextIt server is now updated on checkout (for user).

2.0.4

  1. ENHANCEMNET: Various updates & bug fixes

2.0.3

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Allow field configuration to use default value (defined in defaultFieldValue() method)
  2. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Don't attempt to update the TextIt Contact record before it's reactivated again
  3. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Fatal error if PMPro isn't active/installed
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Adding PHPDoc for all methods
  5. BUG/FIX: Ensure the flowtype is configured for the user/contact upon transmission to TextIt servers

2.0.2

  1. BUG/FIX: Didn't include CSS in build

2.0.1

  1. BUG/FIX: Didn't return fields from TextIt Service

2.0

  1. BUG/FIX: Don't attempt to load User Service information record for user if the table doesn't exist
  2. BUG/FIX: Alignment issue for table(s) on checkout page
  3. BUG/FIX: Updated the DB record before knowing if the service update was successful
  4. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Numerous updates to support v2 of the TextIt API
  5. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Add mapping of PDB to TextIt User Fields on Settings -> HowsU Settings page
  6. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Verify user's registration status on TextIt service before attempting to update/change data for them
  7. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: URN needs an array value (not the old text value) to work
  8. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Better handling of UUIDs and Groups
  9. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Dynamic mapping of user data fields to include in contact updates on TextIt service
  10. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Block/Unblock user when pausing/resuming service
  11. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Remove user data on TextIt service when blocking TextIt service
  12. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Use URN info to update specific contact info upstream (avoids warnings/error messages)
  13. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Updated error handling for updateTextItService() method
  14. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Use more descriptive settings/options array name
  15. ENHANCEMENT/FIX: Style for Payment Info (Credit Card)
  16. ENHANCEMENT: Rename the loadOptions() member function to loadSettings()
  17. ENHANCEMENT: Save the options/settings for the HowsU/TextIt Integration
  18. ENHANCEMENT: Allow admin to specify the source table for the user's service information records
  19. ENHANCEMENT: Use AJAX to force refresh of the groups/settings
  20. ENHANCEMENT: Cache TextIt Groups/Flows on local server to minimize API requests
  21. ENHANCEMENT: Load Option page JavaScript and CSS when loading the option page (only)
  22. ENHANCEMENT: Add styling for the Options/Settings page
  23. ENHANCEMENT: Add options page w/default values matching existing configuration
  24. ENHANCEMENT: Adding version string to Stylesheet for Option page
  25. ENHANCEMENT: Allow admin to force a fetch of existing flows/groups on the TextIt API server
  26. ENHANCEMENT: Place the refresh flow/group button more prominently on the page
  27. ENHANCEMENT: Updated license per GPL requirements
  28. ENHANCEMENT: Redirect to login if user isn't logged in
  29. ENHANCEMENT: Cache all upstream data we use (force reload from Settings page if needed).
  30. ENHANCEMENT: Update TextIt API key if needed via Settings page
  31. ENHANCEMENT: Update TextIt User Fields -> Participants DB maps on Settings page

1.1.4

  1. ENH/BUG: Add the edit-my-details page stub as valid pdb page

1.1.3

  1. BUG: Fix debug output

1.1.2

  1. ENH/BUG: Didn't always handle empty data properly in shortcodes

1.1.1

  1. ENH: Fix typo

1.1

  1. ENH: Languages stub
  2. ENH: Initial commit of license functionality.
  3. ENH: Add welcome message shortcode

1.0

  1. Initial release
